sentences.en: Both the horses were out, tacked up and ready to ride.
sentences.cn: 两匹马都牵出来装上了马具,可以骑了.

sentences.en: Can you give me a ride back to town?
sentences.cn: 你能捎我回镇上吗？

sentences.en: Can you ride?
sentences.cn: 你会骑马吗？

sentences.en: Chris didn't fit in with the rest of them, but was thrilled to be along for the ride.
sentences.cn: 克里斯和其他人并不很合得来，但和大家一起开开心也感到兴奋。

sentences.en: He prefers travelling on the subway to riding in a limousine.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.en: He was riding a large grey mare.
sentences.cn: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.en: He was told to remount his horse and ride back to Lexington.
sentences.cn: 他被告知再次骑上马回列克星敦。

sentences.en: I don't ride my motorbike much anymore.
sentences.cn: 我不怎么骑我的摩托车了。

sentences.en: I managed to get a ride down to the station.
sentences.cn: 我设法搭了便车去车站。

sentences.en: I'm not happy unless I ride or drive every day.
sentences.cn: 只有每天骑车或开车我才会开心。

sentences.en: If you want a cheap ride, take a minicab.
sentences.cn: 要想出行便宜，就坐小型出租车吧。

sentences.en: Many people in this area ride horseback.
sentences.cn: 这个地区有很多人骑马。

sentences.en: Naomi was given a pony and taught to ride side-saddle.
sentences.cn: 别人给娜奥米一匹小型马并教会她如何侧骑马。

sentences.en: Never accept a ride with people who have been drinking.
sentences.cn: 千万别搭喝了酒的司机开的车。

sentences.en: rode out the storm.
sentences.cn: 安然渡过风暴

sentences.en: Sammy had promised to take me for a ride in his truck.
sentences.cn: 萨米答应让我坐他的卡车去兜风。

sentences.en: She learned to ride when she was seven.
sentences.cn: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.en: She lives just a short bus ride from school.
sentences.cn: 她住的地方从学校乘公交车就几站地。

sentences.en: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.cn: 她开着自己的家庭轿车载着几个朋友出去兜了一圈。

sentences.en: The active suspension system gives the car a very smooth ride.
sentences.cn: 这个主动悬架系统使汽车行驶起来非常平稳。

sentences.en: the fleet had &B{ridden out} the &B{storm}.
sentences.cn: 舰队已安然渡过了风暴。

sentences.en: the prime minister was given a rough ride by left-wing MPs yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天首相被左派议员们折腾得厉害。

sentences.en: The ride was smooth until they got into the merchant ship's wake.
sentences.cn: 航行一直很顺利，直到他们碰上了商船的尾流。

sentences.en: there is a great deal of money riding on the results of these studies.
sentences.cn: 有一大笔钱倚仗这些研究的结果。

sentences.en: They still ride around on horses.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然骑着马到处转。

sentences.en: We hitched a ride (= got a free ride from a passing vehicle ) into town.
sentences.cn: 我们拦了一辆便车进城。

sentences.en: Would you like to go for a ride?
sentences.cn: 你想出去兜风吗？

phrases.tran_cn: （人或事物）出人意料地以新的活力重新出现
(非正式)因莽撞（或傲慢）行动招致失败；自讨苦吃；自找麻烦
搭便车；搭顺风车；免费乘车；自由通过
(以新的姿态)再次出现；恢复元气
n. 行驶舒适，（车辆）乘坐平顺性；运行舒适感
岔开去；离去；骑马（或自行车等）而去
从容胜过；骑马来；压制；对…置之不理
骑马撞倒某人；骑马超过某人
安然渡过（尤指风暴、危险或困难）
(北美，非正式)（运动员）做替补，坐冷板凳
(加，非正式)逃票偷乘运货火车
（衣服等离开了原来的位置）缩上去
出租车旅行；乘坐出租车
搭便车；竖起大拇指向过路汽车作手势要求搭车

trans.tran_cn: 旅行，车程，乘骑设施，（马走的）小路
trans.tran_en: a journey in a vehicle, when you are not driving

trans.tran_cn: 骑（马），乘坐，飘/漂浮，取决于，翻越，嘲弄
trans.tran_en: to sit on an animal, especially a horse, and make it move along
